alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, EASTERN RIPLEY AND CENTRAL DEARBORN COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Osgood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, Manchester, Mount Sinai, Cold Springs, Farmers Retreat, Versailles Lake and Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
